mapper.sql: id, policeId, policeNum, policeName, unitId, unitName, duty, tel, nx, wx, ydjw, tel_800M, carNum, idCard, startTime, endTime, isValid, createTime, updateTime
mapper.select: select policeId,policeNum,policeName,duty from t_duty where isValid=1 and unitId=#{unitId} and (#{time} between startTime and endTime or to_days(startTime)=to_days(#{time}) or to_days(endTime)=to_days(#{time}))

select
from t_duty where isValid=1 and policeNum=#{userId} and (#{time} between startTime and endTime or to_days(startTime)=to_days(#{time}) or to_days(endTime)=to_days(#{time}))

select
from t_duty where isValid=1 and (policeNum=#{nameOrNum} or policeName=#{nameOrNum}) and (#{time} between startTime and endTime or to_days(startTime)=to_days(#{time}) or to_days(endTime)=to_days(#{time}))
mapper.insert: insert into t_duty (policeId, policeNum, policeName, unitId, unitName, duty, tel, nx, wx, ydjw, tel_800M, carNum, idCard, startTime, endTime, isValid, createTime, updateTime) values (#{policeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ydjw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel800m,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_duty
policeId = #{policeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
policeNum = #{policenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
policeName = #{policename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitId = #{unitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitName = #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isValid = #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_duty set policeId = #{policeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policeNum = #{policenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policeName = #{policename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitId = #{unitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitName = #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nx = #{nx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx = #{wx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ydjw = #{ydjw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel_800M = #{tel800m,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carNum = #{carnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isValid = #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
